Package server.controller

Class AccessControlServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.controller.AccessControlServer

  • public class AccessControlServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is the server class that controls all data access and flow. It is also responsible of creating all the parking user objects once it searches them in the FIU Database.
